Partner Transition Notification {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} {!Account.Name} {!Account.BillingStreet}, {!Account.BillingCity}, {!Account.BillingState}{!Account.BillingPostalCode}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your business. We know that the solar market is competitive and we appreciate the work you do to sell SunPower products. We also recognize the time and energy that you invest in our business relationship and that is one of the reasons that we have rigorous standards for training, customer satisfaction, and co-marketing. We want your investment to maintain your SunPower Dealer status to be protected and a significant asset.
Our records show that, unfortunately, {!Account.Name} has not met the minimum requirements to remain an Elite SunPower dealer. The program requirements that {!Account.Name} missed are:
路 Requirements here
Due to the missed requirements, your status will be changed to Authorized Partner on {date 5 days from date of this email}. At that time, you should not continue to promote yourself as a SunPower Elite Dealer. Please also note that your payment terms now revert to the Authorized Partner Tier of Net 45 days.
SunPower values your business and we look forward to continuing to work with you to help you grow your business.
Should you need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me.
{!Account.RSM__c}
Residential Sales Manager
